description: Numbers for which the "describe what you see" transform A045918 produces a prime.
prog: (PARI) for(i=1,999,isprime(A045918(n)) & print1(n","))  \\ M. F. Hasler, Jan 27 2012
author: _G. L. Honaker, Jr._
extensions: Corrected by inserting the missing a(19)=127 by _M. F. Hasler_, Jan 27 2012
